name: humbly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you do not think you are important: He very humbly ascribes his success to his wife.

humbly adverb
(SIMPLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a simple way: They live humbly.
humbly adverb
(NOT IN PROUD WAY)
in a way that shows you do not consider yourself as better than others: I humbly ask your pardon.
